name: COVID_19COVID_19ExposureICD10CM
title: COVID_19 (COVID_19 Exposure) (ICD10CM)
description: This value set contains some provisional codes created for the COVID-19 response. It may be incomplete, as not all provisional COVID-19 codes are available in VSAC at the time of publication. Please contact the CSTE RCKMS Content Team for a complete list of codes to be included in this value set.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains diagnoses, problems, events, or findings that represent that the patient has had exposure to severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 regardless of the clinical presentation of the condition),(Data Element Scope: Diagnoses, problems, events, or findings documented in a clinical record.),(Inclusion Criteria: severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2; exposure),(Exclusion Criteria: infection)

concept.display: Contact with and (suspected) exposure to COVID-19

contains.display: Contact with and (suspected) exposure to COVID-19
